content: The Undying Vine is one of the Rare Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is incredibly strong, making it one of the better options to choose.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Undying_Vine.md', within the main section titled 'Undying Vine'.
The content is as follows:
The Undying Vine is one of the Rare Soaks for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. The Soak's ability is incredibly strong, making it one of the better options to choose.
